Commentary: Adnan Rasool to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, tucks around the corner for a single
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, flat and on the middle stump, gets forward and dead bats it

Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, slightly short as he pushes it to the right of the bowler
Zia-ul-Haq to Tamim Iqbal, no run, length ball just outside off, pushes softly to the leg side..
Zia-ul-Haq to Tamim Iqbal, no run, on a length and outside off, leans forward and pushes through the cover point
Zia-ul-Haq to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, charges down the track as bowler drags it short and wide out, reaches for it and belts it over the cover region
Zia-ul-Haq to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, superbly done, shows the full face to this full ball on the stump, gets it to the right of midwicket and to the fence..
Zia-ul-Haq to Tamim Iqbal, no run, pushes full and wide as Tamim charges down the track..
Zia-ul-Haq to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, length ball drifting on the pads, clips it nicely to wide of deep backward square leg, very expensive over when you have very less to defend..
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, SIX, tossed up delivery on the leg stump, Hafeez comes down the track and launches over the mid-on
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, flighted ball from round the wicket, wears it on the pad as he tries to sweep, pitched outside leg
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, sweeps it straight into the hands of square leg but Zia-ul-Haq can't hold it, very straight forward chance..
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, short ball on the leg stump, punches down to long-on
Adnan Rasool to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, clips this length ball behind square on the leg side..
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, short and turning across, cuts it nicely but can't beat cover point

Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, short and wide outside off, cuts it straight to cover point
Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, pushes full and spun away beating the outside edge..
Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, short and kept low to beat the attempted cut of Hafeez..
Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, tossed up on middle, presents the full face as he pushes back to the bowler

Zohaib Khan to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, short and angling down the leg, gets down on one knee and works that away to wide of deep backward square leg

Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, tossed up on the middle stump, blocks with the full face

Zohaib Khan to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, comes out and yorks himself, inside edge past through the keeper
Bravo to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, yorker length outside off, defends

Bravo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, full on the off stump, tucks to shortish fine leg..
Bravo to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, full toss down the leg, helps it away to deep fine leg for a single..
Bravo to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, nicely done, touch short and outside off, waits and guides it to the right of third man..

Mendis to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs, full on off stump, clips it through vacant midwicket for a couple with soft hands..
Bravo to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, picks this slowish full ball outside off as he muscled it to wide of deep midwicket for a boundary
Bravo to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, bouncer on the leg, 126 kph, ducks underneath it..
Bravo to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, full ball just shade outside off, driven down to long-on
Bravo to Tamim Iqbal, no run, touch short and moving across, punches off the back foot to cover point
Bravo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, moves across to this length ball, driven down to sweeper cover for a single.
Bravo to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, full ball on the fourth stump line, leans onto it and driven uppishly straight down towards the sight screen
Mendis to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, comes down the track and took this on the full and driven through the extra cover region ..
Mendis to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, length ball on off stump, clips it through midwicket
Mendis to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, ranks out a full toss on the middle, pushes down to long-off

Adnan Rasool to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run, tossed up delivery outside off, driven down to sweeper
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, SIX, tossed up on the middle, skips out and nicely lofts it straight down towards the sight screen, nicely done..
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, makes it a full toss by stepping out, tucks to short midwicket
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, SIX, another biggie, pushes full and across as he steps out. He still manages to reaches for it and drive that over the extra cover, what a shot that is!
Adnan Rasool to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, full on the leg stump, nudges it through midwicket for a single..
Adnan Rasool to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR, comes out as the bowler pushes quicker and down the leg side, healthy glance to the left of the shortish fine leg for another boundary..
Mendis to Mohammad Hafeez, 2 runs, short and down leg, helps it away to wide of deep backward square leg for a couple

Mendis to Mohammad Hafeez, OUT, and finally something for the Qalandar's fans to cheer, but quite late and honestly nothing much to impact on the game. He pushes full and wide as Hafeez skips down the track, misses out completely there and keeper does the rest.
Wicket: ['Mohammad Hafeez st †Mohammad Rizwan b Mendis 43 (37b 3x4 3x6) SR: 116.21']
